title: Rainy city driving, almost stopped at intersection
caption: Ego vehicle driving slowly in a rainy city, stopping at an intersection with other cars and pedestrians.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (softRainNoon). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain, and the visibility is moderate. The ego vehicle is driving slowly and carefully, following a car in front of it. There are other cars on the road, and a pedestrian is crossing the street at the intersection. The traffic lights are visible and display red and green lights.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly because of the rain and the presence of other vehicles and pedestrians. It is stopping at the intersection to let the pedestrian cross safely and to follow the traffic rules. The driver is being cautious and attentive to avoid any accidents or collisions.
